page.title: 10Hobbies.
page.content: My father's spare time is spent working on little projects. At the moment he is restoring an old stationary farm engine called the Wolseley. The machine is fifty years old and at one time it was used to drive a water pump at my grandfather's farm. The machine is green in colour. He is also restoring an old water pump. It is hoped that the Wolseley will be shown at a local vintage machinery show next year. My mother's hobbies are cooking and knitting. Her cooking varies from chocolate eclairs to fruit scones. I enjoy cooking with my mum. She has knitted me a jumper and a waistcoat and at the moment she is knitting me another jumper. My hobbies include pony riding, reading, looking after my pet dog, cat and six rabbits.
